items.sentence: My brother is in the same line of business as you are.
I\'m feeling much better than I was feeling yesterday.
Tom heard a noise and went outside to see what it was.
Tom is going to pay me back what he owes me on Monday.
Tom is good at giving easy-to-understand explanations.
I guess I should have known Tom wasn\'t going to help.
I didn\'t know that Tom couldn\'t speak French at all.
There is not much difference between the two opinions.
I\'m almost certain that Tom will go swimming with us.
I\'m going to Boston to visit my family for Christmas.
Tom told me that he\'s better at doing that than Mary.
Did you catch anything the last time you went fishing?
I was born in Boston, but I was brought up in Chicago.
I was caught in a shower and got drenched to the skin.
I was flat on my back for a week with a terrible cold.
I can tell by the way Tom talks that he\'s a Canadian.
I can\'t believe Tom and Mary used to date each other.
Tom came into the room carrying three bottles of wine.
I used to think that taking walks was a waste of time.
I want to emphasize the need to get this done on time.
I want to remind you that you have a 2:30 appointment.
We did many interesting things when we were in Boston.
We want Tom to play a song or two for us on his banjo.
Tom could\'ve given me some advice if he\'d wanted to.
Modern technology has made our lives more comfortable.
We have a lot of social problems to think about today.
What was the best present you received last Christmas?
Tom and I\'ve known each other since we were children.
Tom and Mary are both already in Boston, aren\'t they?
Tom doesn\'t have to tell Mary if he doesn\'t want to.
I can go a couple of days without eating if I have to.
How long have Tom and Mary been yelling at each other?
How long have you been working as a parking attendant?
How many hours of sleep did you really get last night?
How much longer do you think Tom will want to do that?
Tom asked me to help Mary put new frets on her guitar.
Next time, you should wear something more appropriate.
One good thing about winter is there are no mosquitos.
Tom works six days a week but only gets paid for five.
Tom doesn\'t want to do anything that will upset Mary.
Tom\'s house is at least three times as large as mine.
Maybe Tom has already done what he was supposed to do.
Sorry to impose, but would you please open the window?
I advised Tom not to waste his time trying to do that.
I\'m sure Tom didn\'t know he was supposed to do that.
Tom and Mary did their homework together after school.
Tom and Mary discussed the problem for almost an hour.
Tom was angry at Mary because she parked in his space.
Tom was happy to be home after being away for so long.
Tom was hoping the committee would adopt his proposal.
